glosses: To hunt, to prey on, to capture a prey dead or alive.

examples.text: Avcılar, yasak olmasına rağmen nesli tehlikede olan hayvanı avladılar.
examples.translation: Hunters hunted the endangered animal even though it was illegal.

glosses: To deceive, to dupe, to bamboozle.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish آولامق (avlamak, “to hunt, to deceive, to dupe”), from آو (av, “the chase, hunting of any kind, game, prey”), from Proto-Turkic *āb (“the act of hunting or that which is hunted”), equivalent to av (“hunt, prey”) + -la- (verb forming suffix) + -mak. Cognates with Azerbaijani ovlamaq.
